tbody.Description: Has to be uniqe to each uploader. If the model we are POSTing to has a property with the same name as name: The uploaded file's id reference will be saved there. (Example for value: CVId)
The file's title in database at Images model
he file's description in database at Images model
Description of what you whant the user will upload
This will be the upload sign image of the uploader. Accepts image's path in public, example:'/images/myImage.png'. Notice the difference between this prop and defaultChosenFile.

In case we want to display a default file. For example, when editing an already exists cv file: we will use this prop to display a default file. Accepts file's path in public, example:'/files/myFile.wav'. Notice the difference between this prop and defaultThumbnailImageSrc.
If it is possible to change the file's input's value
Is it required to fill the input or not
Send onChange method to get the data from the fileUploader and use it for your uses
Creates a reference to the chosen file preview element

In case of choosing a file which exceeds the size limitation as they defiend at src/consts/ModulesConfig.json (which can be generated by activating config-generator.sh script), instead of a preview of the file with an error icon and a tooltip that describes the issue, there will be a popup with a messege
